data.title: Promote EIP to final
data.body: Passed Last Call period without any changes

data.patch:
@@ -3,8 +3,7 @@ eip: 2228
 title: Canonicalize the name of network ID 1 and chain ID 1
 author: William Entriken (@fulldecent)
 discussions-to: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/2228
-status: Last Call
-review-period-end: 2021-07-14
+status: Final
 type: Informational
 created: 2019-08-04
 ---

data.body:
Hi! I'm a bot, and I wanted to automerge your PR, but couldn't because of the following issue(s):


	 - EIP 2228 state was changed from last call to final
	 - eip-2228.md is in state final, not draft or last call or review; an EIP editor needs to approve this change
	 - This PR requires review from one of [@MicahZoltu, @lightclient, @arachnid, @cdetrio, @Souptacular, @vbuterin, @nicksavers, @wanderer, @gcolvin, @axic]
weird, @MicahZoltu should this have auto merged provided that you approved it?

Here is the relevant bot error message which as @alita-moore notes, is inaccurate:

> https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/3654/checks?check_run_id=3073655592#step:4:17

Requesting manual merge here please and then bot fixing where that happens.
okay I'll make a ticket to investigate what's going on here

Hi! I'm a bot, and I wanted to automerge your PR, but couldn't because of the following issue(s):


	 - eip-2228.md is in state final at the head commit, not draft or last call or review; an EIP editor needs to approve this change
	 - This PR requires review from one of [@MicahZoltu, @lightclient, @arachnid, @cdetrio, @Souptacular, @vbuterin, @nicksavers, @wanderer, @gcolvin, @axic]
